item.description:
I personally am not a big trivia fan, but I know some of you are. Peddlers Daughter has pub Trivia Night every Tuesday night from 9 PM-11 PM so I figured we could give it a try. First, Second and Third place prizes are awarded. We will meet at 8 PM for drinks and socialization and the trivia begin at 9 PM.

Directions:
http://www.thepeddler...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Pub Trivia Night
